CLASS.describes: AMRUT guidelines will be followed for different

SUB_CLASS.describes: type of Land Use class and sub class. The details of class and sub class given in Annexure XI

LM_ID.describes: It will start with “LM” followed by 4 digits in incremental order.

LM_DESC.describes: Landmark details (Name and or Description) In case of temple (Landmark code - 03) mention name of the main deity

LM_CODE.describes: Landmark  code  that  used  for  field  data collection as well as data updation will be as - All Traffic  Junctions/Chowks  -  01;  Historical Monument (Specific   Buildings/Statute/Any other land base feature of historical importance  - 02; Temples - 03; Mosques - 04; Churches -  05;  Gurudwara  -  05;  Any  Other  Religious  Structure - 06; Important Government Offices  (Like DM Office, Court, Any Other Central or  State Government Offices - 07; Municipal Assets & Offices - 08; Jal Kal Vibhag Assets & Offices - 09; Popular Colleges or Big Institutes - 10; Bus  Station - 11; Railway Station - 12; Post Offices - 13; Police Stations - 14; Ghats - 15; Big and or Popular Hotels and Restaurants - 16; Cremation  Grounds - 17; Kabristan - 18; Graveyard - 19; Open Market/Vending Area - 20; Any Other - 21.
